description: This file provides an abstraction layer over AsyncStorage for storing and retrieving authentication tokens and user profile data within a React Native application.

methods.name: setToken
methods.description: Stores the authentication token securely in async storage.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored authentication token from async storage.

methods.name: clearToken
methods.description: Removes the stored authentication token from async storage.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Stores the user profile as a JSON string in async storage.

methods.name: getUser
methods.description: Retrieves and parses the user profile JSON from async storage.

methods.name: clearUser
methods.description: Removes the stored user profile from async storage.
